title: Mads Pedersen Settles for Bittersweet Podium After Classics Season Battling GOATs: ‘This Year Wasn’t For Me’
content:
Pedersen philosophical after having good legs but bad luck: 'I was unlucky to puncture when I did.'

Read the full article at Mads Pedersen Settles for Bittersweet Podium After Classics Season Battling GOATs: ‘This Year Wasn’t For Me’ on Velo.
author: ahood
